typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	wildcardPaths:['emp.csv']) ~> source1
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source2, source1 lookup(source2@ProductCategoryID == source1@ProductCategoryID,
	multiple: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'left')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['lookup.csv'],
	umask: 0222,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Name = source1@Name,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		ProductCategoryID = source2@ProductCategoryID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		ModifiedDate = source1@ModifiedDate
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
